title: is there a way i can send post game chat logs to riot games through the support site?
body: I'm wondering if there is a way i can send the whole entire post game chat log, well the specifics, of what one toxic player said through the whole post game, to riot games, is there a way to do that?

replies.body:
You can do that in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but you can also make sure to send a report in the post-game lobby. Doing so will flag the reported account for review and we can take a look at their chat logs during that review.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ez3y8GBP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-11T02:53:36.365+0000)
>
> You can do that in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but you can also make sure to send a report in the post-game lobby. Doing so will flag the reported account for review and we can take a look at their chat logs during that review.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

I do have another question, actually multiple questions, first, who parts of the support ticket do i have to go through, with the whole submit a request, well specifically after that, as i am at a bit of a loss.

Second question, how long can i go without sending the chat logs from an old game? Also should i keep the persons summoner name in the log or erase it?

The first ticket category from the dropdown menu should work just fine. As for how long you should wait? I'd recommend sending it in relatively quickly, as it can help us be more effective this way. Lastly, leaving their summoner name in would be preferred, as it ensures we have all available context.

I hope this cleared up the confusion!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ez3y8GBP,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-02-01T02:42:12.010+0000)
>
> The first ticket category from the dropdown menu should work just fine. As for how long you should wait? I'd recommend sending it in relatively quickly, as it can help us be more effective this way. Lastly, leaving their summoner name in would be preferred, as it ensures we have all available context.
> 
> I hope this cleared up the confusion!

I have tried that, yet whenever i fill out the rest of the information like Summoner Name, Username, Region, all of that, it all green, but when i click on Category it will get rid of the description box and replace it with the Definitely not Blitzcrank splash art with the text

> HELLO, FELLOW HUMAN!

> I SEE THAT YOU WANT TO SUBMIT FEEDBACK ABOUT SOMETHING IN LEAGUE OF LEGENDS. I GRABBED YOUR REQUEST BECAUSE I AM VERY EXCITED AND WANT TO HELP YOU!
> 
> THE BEST PLACE TO SUBMIT FEEDBACK WOULD BE ON ONE OF THE FOLLOWING BOARDS:
> 
> NA
>     Gameplay and Balance
>     Skin and Champion Concepts
>     Story and Art
>     Bug Reports
> 	
> OCE
>     Gameplay and Strategy
>     Player Creations
> 
> EUW
>     Champions and Gameplay
>     Community Creations
>     Suggestions and Bug Reports
> 
> EUNE
>     Champions and Gameplay
>     Community Creations
>     Suggestions and Bug Reports
> 
> PLEASE MAKE SURE TO POST YOUR FEEDBACK IN THE APPROPRIATE BOARD!
> 
> HAVE A GRAB-FREE AND PLEASANT HUMAN DAY!

I am not sure if there is a way around this, but if i cannot get past this then I cannot submit a ticket at all. I've normally never had this issue, so if there is something i am doing wrong please let me know, i can give you a step by step process of what i am doing to get this specific result, if that will help to better understand my current situation. 

I do thank you for your time and patience in dealing with me and this current issue. I am trying my best, as I do want to make League of Legends a lot less toxic.

Wow, I've never heard or seen of this before. That's really interesting! Are you not selecting the ticket category first? Maybe try that after [**clearing your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).

If you still see the page, can you [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) and cover up any sensitive information such as username, etc? Try to grab the URL with the screenshot if you can.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ez3y8GBP,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-05T21:42:36.751+0000)
>
> Wow, I've never heard or seen of this before. That's really interesting! Are you not selecting the ticket category first? Maybe try that after [**clearing your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).
> 
> If you still see the page, can you [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) and cover up any sensitive information such as username, etc? Try to grab the URL with the screenshot if you can.

I have indeed cleared my browsers cache, yet it still appears for some reason, the ticket category i am choosing is "I have a question about League of Legends or Riot games" I'm going to have to send it in ether two or three screen shots. Unfortunately since i do not have Gyazo pro, the information cannot be covered up but i will not put in my summoner name, so hopefully that will be a good coverup.

https://gyazo.com/8e9e1f76e2ef03a316fa540621b09dbf

https://gyazo.com/f9b26ff9e69308467d1bcbbf5748446e

https://gyazo.com/9dd79da8769df71197cd3f21eab74224

These are the screen shots I have taken, hopefully they provide all the information necessary.
Can you try another category (below language) other than **Feedback**? This should resolve what you're seeing.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ez3y8GBP,comment-id=0000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-08T23:12:40.928+0000)
>
> Can you try another category (below language) other than **Feedback**? This should resolve what you're seeing.

Alright, i have chosen General Questions as the category, i do not know if it will be read, but it isn't giving me the whole blitz image anymore. Thank you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ez3y8GBP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-11T02:53:36.365+0000)
>
> You can do that in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but you can also make sure to send a report in the post-game lobby. Doing so will flag the reported account for review and we can take a look at their chat logs during that review.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

Alright, thank you very much! I sent the report yesterday, when this happened, I'll send the chat log as soon as i can.
